Name: Armored Freedom
About the game: Armored Freedom is an intense strategy board game where giant robots fight for dominance. Roll the dice to charge and wage war using battle cards. Unveil hidden secrets within special action cards. Armored Freedom takes place in a world where wars are fought with giant mechs. Roll the dice to move your mechs and crush your enemies with battle cards in turn-based, boardgame-style gameplay. Fight across four distinctive terrains: forest, desert, snow and minimalistic 'zen' style boards. Customize your pilot and mech. Increase your rank and win medals. Unlock unique items and recruit heroes with special abilities. Wage epic single and multiplayer battles across four different gameplay modes. Entrust your freedom to heavy armor in single-player and multiplayer matches.
